title: As a club, I want to see the names of players drafted in each pick
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- For the 2016 draft, show the roster names of the players drafted by that Club for each pick. - Also show the player's class- Additionally for the 2017 draft, populate the player names real time as the draft is in progress.- Player's name links to player profileNote:Discussion topic -  how do we handle changes in draft order and matching up the uploaded SB values

title: As a Club, I want to see the Signing Bonuses of the players that I have Signed
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- For all players listed on the widget, once their 1st yr dom contract reaches Terms Accepted, show the Actual Signing Bonus Value of the contract in the "Actual Bonus" Column- The Signing Bonus can come from either the Signing Bonus Clause or the Dual Sport Clause- Any contracts without one of these 2 clauses should show zero in that column- Show the total of these values in the footer- Additionally, populate the Signing Date column. It should link to contract- For the footer of the Signing Date column, show the total number of  rows where a Signing Date is populated

title: As BOC, I want to set players who are not subject to the signing deadline
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- Add the NSD column to the table visible to BOC and Clubs- BOC and club users have the same functionality, however the NSD column is not editable to Clubs- BOC can edit this column and set the NSD status of a player. Note that this field also exists on the player profile and should be editable from both places- BOC can save changes- Players who are set as NSD are not subject to the Signing Deadline. The impact of this will be covered in upcoming stories

title: As a club, I want to see my Final Signing Bonus Pool
custom_steps: - The final Actual Signing bonus pool appears in the second row of the summary header- For the 'Final' row, it is calculated as the total of the "Signing Bonus Values" for rows, irrespective of NSD, which have a Signed Date (i.e. rows in black)For example:Yankees start with an Actual Signing Bonus Pool of zero. Once the draft is finished, they negotiate and sign a player drafted in a 1st round  pick with a Signing Bonus Value of 1,000,000.So the club's new Actual Signing Bonus Pool is now 1,000,000

title: As a club, I want to see my total Signing Bonuses
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- The total Signing Bonus is the total at the footer of the Amt toward Threshold column. This should also be displayed in the header summary- The Total Signing Bonuses by the R4 Draft signing deadline (system date) is shown in Row 1 of the summary. It is locked on this date-  Any changes to this value after the signing deadline are reflected in Row 2 of the summary- Additionally, once the Signing Deadline has passed, all rows that are not marked as NSD and do not yet have a contract should be greyed out

title: As a Club, I want to see my maximum Signing Bonus Pool
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**-  On the Minor Contracts dashboard, add a new tab called ‰ÛÏRule 4 Signing Bonuses‰Û￾ - Add the year toggle and default to 2017. It should default to the upcoming draft when the slot values are available in the system- Add an Org toggle. If logged in as Club, default the Org toggle to the club. If logged in as BOC, default to first Org on the list- Add the Round, Overall and Bonus Value columns.- Display all picks that the club has in the 2016 draft. Order by Overall pick number. - Each Overall pick in rounds up to and including Round 10 is assigned a Signing Bonus Value, including compensation selections, selections from the Competitive Balance Draft, etc. .- The sum of a Club's Signing Bonus Values for all of its selections up to and including Round 10 will constitute its Maximum Signing Bonus Pool.- This number is seen in the 'Totals' box at the bottom of the table as the total of "Signing Bonus Value" columnNote:- For testing purposes, I would suggest duplicating the same Signing Bonus Values for year 2017 also. The correct values will not be released until about April

title: As a club, I want to see any Passed Over players that I've signed during the current Signing Period
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- In addition to showing draft picks, all passed over players who have a first year domestic contract that has reached Terms Accepted State are shown at the bottom of the table.- In place of Round and Overall, show "Passed Over"- The contract must be signed between the draft and the following year draft. For example, for a passed over contract to appear in the 2016 year, it should be signed between the first day of the 2016 draft and day before the 2017 draft. Any contract signed after that will appear under 2017.

title: As a Club, I want to see the amount that counts towards my Total Signing Bonus for picks after round 10
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- Add the 'Amount Toward Threshold' column to the table. The amounts for each row that count toward the Total are listed under the "Amt toward Threshold" column- For picks up to and including round 10, the full amount of the bonus counts toward the Threshold- For any picks after that and passed over players, only any amounts greater than 100,000 count towards the Threshold. The first 100,000 will not count toward the total but the excess is counted. For example, if the amount is 150,000, then only 50,000 is counted.- Show the total in the footer

title: As a club, I want to see by how much over/under that I signed the player
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- Add the Over/Under column to this widget- This shows by how much the Actual Signing Bonus on the contract varies from the Signing Bonus Value for that pick.- For rows where this is no SB value, all amounts toward Threshold are shown as over- Any zero values are shown in black- If the amount is over, show in red with a + sign- If amount is under, show in green with a - sign- Show the total at the footer. If the total is over the pool, show in red, if under show green

title: As BOC/Club, I only want users with MNC permissions to see the R4 SB utility
custom_steps: **AC**- Only BOC users with MNC Admin permissions can have full access to R4 SB utilities- BOC users with Read only access to MNC can only have Read only access to SB utilities. They do not see an edit button on this screen- Only Club users with MNC Admin permissions can have full club access to R4 SB utilities- Club users with Read only access to MNC can only have Read only access to R4 SB utilities. They do not see an edit button on this screen- Additionally Clubs should never see an Edit button when toggling to another ORG

title: As a club, I want to see my Actual Signing Bonus Pool as of the Signing Deadline
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- The Signing Deadline is set in system dates as "Rule 4 draft Signing Deadline". This date is shown in the first line of the header summary- The Actual Signing Bonus pool is the shown in the Header Summary Box under 'Signing Bonus Pool'.- A club typically begins with an Actual Signing Bonus Pool of zero. This is because the Signing Bonus Value is only counted towards the Actual Signing Bonus Pool when a Player has been signed for that Overall Pick that the Signing Bonus Value is associated with.- However, if a player drafted in rounds up to round 10 is marked as NSD, that player's bonus value is included in the 'Signing Bonus Pool' box for the Signing Deadline row in the Summary box.-  Therefore, the Actual Signing Bonus Pool as of the Signing Deadline is calculated as the total of the "Signing Bonus Values" for rows which have a Signed Date plus the signing bonus values of any players who are marked as NSDFor example:The Yankees have 10 bonus values as they drafted 10 players upto Round 10. They signed 7 of their picks, 2 picks are marked as NSD, and 1 pick was not signed. Their Signing Bonus Pool as of the Signing Deadline is:Sum of bonus values of 7 guys who signed + sum of bonus values of 2 guys who were NSD

title: As a Club, I want to see any penalties I may have incurred from exceeding the Pool
custom_steps: **AC**- "Overage" is the club's (Total Signing Bonuses) - (Signing Bonus Pool). If this number is zero or less than zero, show as 0 (0.0%). If greater than zero, show the amount in the header summary and it's percentage value of the Signing Bonus Pool. - Also show any incurred penalties in the header summary- Calculating 'Penalty Tax'0.1% upto 9.9% , the penalty is 75% of overage value10% or greater, the penalty is 100% of overage value- Calculating Non-Monetary Penalties0% upto 4.9% - None5% upto 9.9%, show penalty as Loss of 1st round pick 10% upto 14.9%, show penalty as Loss of 1st and 2nd round picks 15% or greater, show penalty as Loss of first round picks for next 2 years

- BOC can still delete these contracts

custom_steps:
AC:
- Clicking Add Row will add a new row to the bottom of the international and R4 SB utility and the table will automatically scroll to that row

title: As a club, I want to project my future signings
custom_steps:
**Wire**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1

**Full set of rules**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044

**AC**
- Add the "Proj. Bonus" column to the table
- In Edit mode, clubs can update the value for this column but only for rows where an Actual Signing Bonus does not exist. If a proj value exists and a contract is signed for that row, the proj bonus is automatically cleared by the system.
- Proj Bonus should only accept numbers and auto add commas
- Additionally, Clubs can "Add Row". This will add a row to the bottom of the table. The only editable fields are Proj Bonus and Player name. Player name is a free type field
- Club can save changes
- Add toggle "Include Projected Signings". It should always default to NO on page load
- If set to Yes, then the math on the "Amt towards Threshold", Over/Under, and the header summary update to include the Proj Bonus Value, treating it as the Signing Bonus amount for that player's contract

title: As a club, I want to track all my draft contracts in one place
custom_steps:
**Wireframe:**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=draft_contracts

**AC**
- Add a new tab to the Minor Contracts Dashboard called "Draft Contracts"
- Add a new widget "Draft Contracts" with the following columns:
-- Player (Link to PPP)
-- Round
-- Overall 
-- Org (BOC only)
-- Club
-- Status(Link to contract)
-- Signing Date 
-- Contract Year
-- Signing Bonus
- Data in the table(excluding links, which are blue) should be red for Prelim, Green for TS, TA, Black for approved
- For club users, only show contracts for draft players in their org
- BOC users can see all contracts for all draft picks
- BOC has header filters to filter by Org. Default to all orgs.
- BOC and Club have a header filter that lets them navigate by year. Default to current Draft Year
- Only needs to work from year 2017 onwards
- Widget is default sorted by Overall Pick

title: BOC Can approve a contract and player is active on roster

GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND already have a contract in terms submitted/accepted state
custom_steps: WHEN I click Approve on the players contract
custom_expected:
THEN the contract updates to approved
AND player can be found on roster for the club he is signed to

THEN I can view and edit a field called BOC notes on the contract
AND Club cannot see or edit this field

And I am viewing a contract that is terms submitted

AND Contract history shows contract in red

AND status header is updated

title: BOC can approve a contract from the MNC verf. widget

title: As BOC I want to reject a Pre Approved contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a submitted pre approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user rejects the contract
custom_expected:
THEN status/header/date is updated
AND contract is removed from clipboard
AND profile entry updated and in black
AND contract reloads in view mode
AND blue notification populates
AND contract is still fully editable to BOC
AND contract is visible to other clubs except attachments/comments

title: As BOC I can delete a rejected or withdrawn contract

custom_expected:
THEN show confirmation message
AND entry is removed from history

title: As BOC I want to withdraw a TA contract

AND history entry is updated

title: As BOC I want to void a contract

and I am viewing an approved contract

title: Club users can find a domestic amateur player through quick search and create a 1st year contract
custom_steps:
1. WHEN club performs a quick search for a domestic amateur player drafted by their club
AND clicks on their profile
AND creates a new minor contract from the create new button in their profile header

2. WHEN club performs a quick search for a domestic amateur player that was passed over
AND clicks on their profile
AND creates a new minor contract from the create new button in their profile header
custom_expected: THEN a new contract is created for the club and opens in preliminary mode

title: Club can submit contract terms to BOC for Approval
custom_preconds:

AND changes are saved
AND the form is reloaded in view mode
AND blue notification appears after successfully updated
AND status header to show Terms Submitted in green
AND 'Status Last changed, Changed by, Date Submitted and Submitted by' fields in the Status and Dates section are updated

title: As Club I want to attach files and edit player information in TA state

- Player's street address and city, state, zip fields in Player summary section
- Location Signed fields in Execution of Contract section
- Signatory and Negotiator fields in Execution of Contract section
- The club comments field

AND I can attach files and SAVE these changes

AND I cannot add/remove clauses or addendums (Add terms is locked)

title: Club can print the execution page of the contract
custom_preconds:
Link to Template: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347096?projectId=14044
Link to Sample: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044
Li​nk to Report details: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347095?projectId=14044
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print
custom_expected:
THEN all behavior listed in Report Details for Execution of Contract should be met except for any E-sig related notes, parental consent and commissioners stamping
AND data on printed Execution of Contract should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND the Execution of Contract should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND ff English only, then it should fit on one page.  
AND there should be space left for Commissioner's stamp section at the bottom of the page.
AND any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again
